import { Container, Button, Row, Form, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; const EmployeeCard = ({ employeeid, btnValue, editMode, firstname, department, designation, mobile, email, date, newFirstnameUpdated, newDepartmentUpdated, newDesignationUpdated, newMobileUpdated, newEmailUpdated, } ) => { return (
updateEmployee(e, employeeid, findEmployee)} autoComplete="true" className="all-employees_form" >

Image

Employee ID:

{employeeid}

Name:

{(btnValue === employeeid) & (editMode == true) ? ( { setNewFirstname(e.target.value); setNewFirstnameUpdated(true); }} placeholder={ (btnValue === employeeid) & !newFirstnameUpdated ? firstname : newFirstnameUpdated & (btnValue === employeeid) ? newFirstname : firstname } /> ) : (

{newFirstnameUpdated ? newFirstname : firstname}

)}

Department

{(btnValue === employeeid) & (editMode == true) ? ( { setNewDepartment(e.target.value); setNewDepartmentUpdated(true); }} placeholder={ (btnValue === employeeid) & !newDepartmentUpdated ? department : newDepartmentUpdated & (btnValue === employeeid) ? newDepartment : department } /> ) : (

{newDepartmentUpdated ? newDepartment : department}

)}

Role

{(btnValue === employeeid) & (editMode == true) ? ( { setNewDesignation(e.target.value); setNewDesignationUpdated(true); }} placeholder={ (btnValue === employeeid) & !newDesignationUpdated ? designation : newDesignationUpdated & (btnValue === employeeid) ? newDesignation : designation } /> ) : (

{newDesignationUpdated ? newDesignation : designation}

)}

Mobile

{(btnValue === employeeid) & (editMode == true) ? ( { setNewMobile(e.target.value); setNewMobileUpdated(true); }} placeholder={ (btnValue === employeeid) & !newMobileUpdated ? mobile : newMobileUpdated & (btnValue === employeeid) ? newMobile : mobile } /> ) : (

{newMobileUpdated ? newMobile : mobile}

)}

email

{(btnValue === employeeid) & (editMode == true) ? ( { setNewEmail(e.target.value); setNewEmailUpdated(true); }} placeholder={ (btnValue === employeeid) & !newEmailUpdated ? email : newEmailUpdated & (btnValue === employeeid) ? newEmail : email } /> ) : (

{newEmailUpdated ? newEmail : email}

)}

join date

{date}

Actions

{(btnValue === employeeid) & (editMode == true) ? ( ) : (
)} {/* END CONTAINER ROW */}
;
); }; export default EmployeeCard;
